title: [Boreas Meadows, Ostria Court]
description: The feet of many people have worn this small road down to nothing but dirt, though a plethora of wildflowers provide splashes of color along the edges.  Homes rise up from behind the flowers, a few scraggly trees stuck here and there between them.

The feet of many people have worn this small road down to nothing but dirt, the wildflowers along the edges washed out to pastels from the moonlight above.  Homes rise up from behind the flowers, a few scraggly trees stuck here and there between them.
